title: ArtyTorrent Pack 59-Ueberschall House Essentials Bass Oneshots-W
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 59-Ueberschall House Essentials Bass Oneshots-WAV
------------------------------------------------------------------

This is the third part of the full Ueberschall House Essentials sample disc. Oneshot bass samples (all with A as the root note). These aren&#039;t multisamples, but you should find some usable stuff for your sampler, as bass samples are usually OK if you map them over a few keys and apply some keytracking of filters.

Torrent contains 4 RAR files with 110 oneshot samples
-----------------------------------------------------
HE48.BASSa-DEEP
HE49.BASSa-HOUSE
HE50.BASSa-DANCE
HE51.BASSa-PICK

All samples are normalized 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz.

More House Essentials later today.

Comments/thanks/requests are welcome.

--
Arty - "Bass in the place"
15th February 2008.
